price: همدغه شان برلاسى حكمت والا الله تا ته او هغو ته چې له تا مخکې وو، وحي راليږي.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ يُوحِيٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika yūḥī ilayka wa-ilā alladhīna min qablika al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
